{\n    if (scrollContainerRef.current) {\n      const { scrollLeft, scrollWidth, clientWidth } = scrollContainerRef.current;\n      setShowLeftButton(scrollLeft &gt; 0);\n      setShowRightButton(scrollLeft &lt; scrollWidth - clientWidth - 1);\n    }\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (activeTabRef.current &amp;&amp; scrollContainerRef.current) {\n      const container = scrollContainerRef.current;\n      const tab = activeTabRef.current;\n      const containerRect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n      const tabRect = tab.getBoundingClientRect();\n\n      if (tabRect.left &lt; {\n    e.preventDefault();\n\n    // Random direction to escape\n    const angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;\n    const distance = 100 + Math.random() * 150; // 100-250px\n\n    const newX = Math.cos(angle) * distance;\n    const newY = Math.sin(angle) * distance;\n\n    // Clamp to not go too far off screen\n    const clampedX = Math.max(-200, Math.min(200, escapeOffset.x + newX));\n    const clampedY = Math.max(-150, Math.min(150, escapeOffset.y + newY));\n\n    setEscapeOffset({ x: clampedX, y: clampedY });\n    setIsEscaping(true);\n    setEscapeMessage(escapeMessages[Math.floor(Math.random() * escapeMessages.length)]);\n    setEscapeCount(prev =&gt; prev + 1);\n\n    // Reset escaping animation state\n    setTimeout(() =&gt; setIsEscaping(false), 300);\n\n    // After 5 escapes, slowly return home\n    if (escapeCount &gt;= 4) {\n      setTimeout(() =&gt; {\n        setEscapeOffset({ x: 0, y: 0 });\n        setEscapeCount(0);\n        setEscapeMessage('üòå V·ªÅ nh√† th√¥i~');\n        setTimeout(() =&gt; setEscapeMessage(''), 1500);\n      }, 2000);\n    }\n  }, [escapeOffset, escapeCount]);\n\n  // Double click to reset\n  const handleDoubleClick = useCallback(() =&gt; {\n    setEscapeOffset({ x: 0, y: 0 });\n    setEscapeCount(0);\n    setEscapeMessage('üè† V·ªÅ v·ªã tr√≠ c≈©!');\n    setTimeout(() =&gt; setEscapeMessage(''), 1500);\n  }, []);\n\n  // Pick design elements based on room ID\n  const colorTheme = colorThemes[seededRandom(seed, colorThemes.length)];\n  const borderStyle = borderStyles[seededRandom(seed + 1, borderStyles.length)];\n  const bgPattern = bgPatterns[seededRandom(seed + 2, bgPatterns.length)];\n}",

(e.g., &#96;isLoading&#96;)\n4. **Early Returns**: Handle edge cases first\n5. **No Classes**: Functional/declarative patterns only\n6. **Tailwind**: Utility-first, no custom CSS unless necessary\n7. **Accessibility**: ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, semantic HTML\n\n### SOLID Principles\n- **S**: Each component has single responsibility\n- **O**: Components are open for extension (via props/composition)\n- **L**: Child components can substitute parent expectations\n- **I**: Interfaces are specific, not monolithic\n- **D**: Components depend on abstractions (props interfaces)\n\n### Design Patterns\n- **Composition**: Build complex UIs from simple components\n- **Container/Presentational**: Separate data logic from rendering\n- **Custom Hooks**: Extract reusable logic\n- **Provider Pattern**: For theme/global state (if needed)\n\n---\n\n## Feature Priorities\n\n### Phase 1 (MVP)\n- [ ] Tab navigation with 6 sections\n- [ ] Overview dashboard\n- [ ] Schedule timeline\n- [ ] Room assignments grid\n- [ ] Basic responsive design\n\n### Phase 2\n- [ ] Participants list with filtering\n- [ ] Menu details with pricing\n- [ ] Budget table and summary\n- [ ] Transport info\n\n### Phase 3 (Enhancements)\n- [ ] Search functionality\n- [ ] Export to PDF\n- [ ] Dark/Light mode toggle\n- [ ] Print-friendly styles\n- [ ] Copy-to-clipboard for bank info\n\n---\n\n## Sample Component Structure\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n// components/rooms/room-card.tsx\nimport { Card, CardContent, CardHeader } from \"@/components/ui/card\";\nimport { Badge } from \"@/components/ui/badge\";\nimport { Users, Bed } from \"lucide-react\";\nimport type { RoomAssignment } from \"@/types/room.types\";\nimport { cn } from \"@/lib/utils\";\n\ninterface RoomCardProps {\n  room: RoomAssignment;\n  className?: string;\n}\n\nfunction RoomCard({ room, className }: RoomCardProps) {\n  const isFamily = room.type === \"Double\";",
